title: Person Of Interest S1 E5 - Ending
author: Morgs K
comment: Great actors! Both of them! Need to watch their performance second by second to interpret their emotions.
So cute that Finch's footsteps as he walks out of the diner are in rhythm to that great music!  Love this clip!

Great job! I really like the way you bring out important scenes form this series. Thank you!
And the music - it's just perfect with the scenes!
Hahaha, that's actually the real song! Thanks.
description:
The scene, which defines Finch's and Reese's relationship for the rest of the series... especially leading up the Mid-Season Cliff-hanger! 
Jim Caviezel as John Reese 
Michael Emerson as Harold Finch
